name: High Road Back Seat Barrier for Dogs - Car Divider for Dogs for Behind Front Seat - Padded Steel Frame with Heavy Duty Coated Dog Net Barrier for Car, Truck or SUV
short_description: Dog Back Seat Net Divider That Won't Block the View - designed by High Road in the U.S. in 2014, our sturdy metal and mesh car dog barrier with a chew-resistant coated net separator panel allows 4-pawed road trip companions a full view of the front seat to help reduce ride stress while giving drivers an open view of the road

Back Seat Barrier for Dogs with Rigid Top Panel - steel top frame with protective foam bumpers stays upright and stable - won't bend, stretch or fold down - durable coated heavy duty mesh fabric provides top to bottom coverage to keep medium and large sized dogs from getting into the front seat

Narrower Profile for a Universal Fit - no measuring for width needed, our dog back seat barrier fits most compact cars, sedans, SUVs and trucks without butting against the doors or restricting back seat passenger entry, its tapered design is wide at the top to prevent dogs from jumping over the gate NOTE: not recommended for small dogs that can fit between the front door and seat areas - does not cover the area between the front seat and doors where active smaller dogs can jump through

Adjustable Height Keeps from Blocking the Rear View - can be positioned at the top of the headrest in trucks and SUVs or lower and level with the seat back in compact cars and sedans to keep the rear mirror view unobstructed - includes 4 adjustable straps to attach whichever way works best for your vehicle, with a bottom cord that attaches to the seat base for secure coverage and stability

Easy to Install, Convenient to Use - disassembles for compact storage, assembly and installation instructions included, spot clean. High Road has been developing innovative car accessories for people and their 4-pawed friends from our office in Portland Maine for over 30 years.

At the end of a fun-filled day, the dog barrier quickly disassembles and conveniently stores in the included storage pouch.
